committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To provide for assistance to customers of the Western Area Power Administration for the design and development of cost-effective renewable energy projects, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Hoover Power Plant Act of 1984 to direct the Administrator of the Western Area Power Authority (WAPA) to establish a Renewable Energy Joint Venture Fund to provide technical and related grant assistance, upon the request of a WAPA customer, to facilitate the development and design of cost-effective renewable energy projects by such customer. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes amounts in the fund to be used to finance transmission interconnections for renewable energy projects.

titles.title: To provide for assistance to customers of the Western Area Power Administration for the design and development of cost-effective renewable energy projects, and for other purposes.
